name: @mastra/longmemeval
description: LongMemEval benchmark implementation for Mastra Memory

scripts.bench:s:preference: tsx src/cli.ts run --dataset longmemeval_s --model gpt-4o --question-type single-session-preference --subset 1 --concurrency 10
scripts.d:bench:s:preference: NODE_OPTIONS=--inspect-brk tsx src/cli.ts run --dataset longmemeval_s --model gpt-4o --question-type single-session-preference --subset 1 --concurrency 10
scripts.bench:s:working: tsx src/cli.ts run --dataset longmemeval_s --model gpt-4o --memory-config working-memory --concurrency 10
scripts.bench:s:working:quick: tsx src/cli.ts run --dataset longmemeval_s --model gpt-4o --memory-config working-memory --subset 10 --concurrency 5
scripts.run:s: tsx src/cli.ts run -d longmemeval_s -m gpt-4o -c semantic-recall
scripts.run:s:lastk: tsx src/cli.ts run -d longmemeval_s -m gpt-4o -c last-k
scripts.run:s:working: tsx src/cli.ts run -d longmemeval_s -m gpt-4o -c working-memory
scripts.run:s:combined: tsx src/cli.ts run -d longmemeval_s -m gpt-4o -c combined
scripts.run:quick: tsx src/cli.ts run -d longmemeval_s -m gpt-4o -c semantic-recall --subset 5
